item.title: Build a photo gallery with Azure Functions
item.description: With Azure Functions you can quickly build simple web applications. In this example you learn how to create a simple photo gallery with just three little functions. We will use Azure Blob Storage to store the files and Azure Table Storage to save metadata. You can find the example at GitHub. Creating thumbnails Since we do not want use the original picture as a thumbnail, we will create a function that creates proper thumbnails.
